Accounting

Local expertise and compliance tailored to your business needs

Companies today require accounting functions that are forward-looking, digitally enabled, and regionally tailored. At Dezan Shira & Associates, we deliver technology-driven, client-focused solutions to manage accounting compliance across Asia’s diverse industries and jurisdictions.

Our services include bookkeeping, treasury support, ERP and accounting software setup, as well as optional in-house finance, payroll, tax, and e-invoicing systems. We also offer IFRS accounting and reporting aligned with both local and international standards.

With decades of experience, we help clients stay compliant with local statutory requirements in key markets like China, India, ASEAN, and the UAE—enabling them to focus on core business priorities.

Prefer email? Reach us at service@dezshira.com How we can help your business

Accounting Services: Our Advantage

Gain clarity with accurate reporting

Stay on top of your operations with reliable books, monthly reports, and consolidated financials.

Ensure compliance with local standards

Align with Asia’s diverse rules, formats, and timelines—while maintaining consistency across all regional entities.

Scalable support for evolving business needs

From new market entry to complex setups, we tailor accounting services to meet evolving needs.

How We Support Your Business

Whether your Asia business is just starting up, on track, or facing tough choices, your outsourced accounting provider must deliver sound fundamentals, and a simple, transparent, intelligent service that is cost-effective.

We deliver specialized accounting solutions tailored for SMEs and larger enterprises - delivered by multi-lingual professionals and world-class financial platforms and processes.

  • Bookkeeping
  • Financial reporting
  • Statutory filing
  • Consolidation of accounts
  • GAAP adjustment
  • Multi-country, multi-office management
  • Virtual CFO services
Outsource your accounting with confidence

Well-managed treasury functions are vital to any business. Our dedicated account managers assist customers in facilitating bank payments, cross-border remittance and collection, and serve as an independent party to provide oversight for proper fund deployments in line with internal management approval guidelines.

  • Country selections for optimum tax and service support
  • Traditional and e-banking processing
  • Cryptocurrency advisory
  • Bank transaction filing
  • Reimbursement claims
  • Declaration reporting for foreign currency
  • Bank and petty cash reconciliation
  • Signatory and approval services
  • Custodian of seals and chops 

We are experts in digital accounting. Our in-house technology teams help clients add digital capabilities with smart, secure, and integrated systems. We provide light-weight accounting apps or ERP solutions, integration, and localization services to help clients achieve compliance through technology and drive value for their business. These tools streamline business administration by enabling remote submissions and approvals, integrating with corporate accounting software, and improving monthly accounting processes with real-time reporting and greater transparency. Our tailored ERP systems support companies across Asia—including for accounting compliance services in China—by enhancing decision-making, productivity, and regulatory alignment.

  • Cloud- and server-based systems
  • Single- and multi-country ERP solutions by MS Dynamics 365, SAP, Netsuite, Sage and others.
  • Accounting software such as Simpler XERO, IMSA, MYOB, QuickBooks, Peachtree, KingDee, Zoho and others.
Learn more

An Interim or Virtual CFO is an on-the-ground resource, who works closely with your team to help achieve your financial objectives, on an interim or annual basis. Our virtual and remote CFO services, or ‘vCFO’, can provide a customized range of services related to the guidance and oversight of financial budgeting, tax and cash flow management, and other areas to provide guidance to, complement, or back up your in-house teams. Improve your organization’s guidance and gain peace of mind with a Virtual CFO.

Recruit trusted virtual CFO support

    FAQs – Accounting Services in Asia

    We provide a full suite of accounting services in Asia, including corporate accounting services, IFRS accounting and reporting services, and treasury management. Our services cover financial reporting, bookkeeping, tax compliance, and CFO advisory to ensure businesses meet local and international accounting standards.

    Our accounting services in Asia ensure compliance with local tax and financial regulations. We provide:

    • Corporate accounting services aligned with country-specific financial laws.
    • Accounting compliance services China, ensuring adherence to GAAP and IFRS standards.
    • Tax services in China to manage local VAT, corporate income tax, and social security contributions.
      By working with experienced corporate accountants, businesses can avoid penalties and maintain regulatory compliance.

    We follow stringent IFRS accounting and reporting services standards to ensure accurate and timely financial statements. Our approach includes:

    • Automated bookkeeping reports for real-time tracking.
    • Internal audit and financial review to verify compliance.
    • Monthly and quarterly reporting for proactive financial oversight.
    • Corporate accounting software integration to enhance efficiency and reduce errors.

    We support multiple corporate accounting software solutions, including:

    • ERP systems tailored for multinational operations.
    • Cloud-based accounting platforms for remote access and collaboration.
    • AI-powered bookkeeping report tools to automate financial processes.

    Our experts help businesses select and implement the right software to optimize financial management.

    Yes, our corporate accounting services include digital expense management solutions that:

    • Automate expense tracking and reporting.
    • Integrate with corporate accounting software for seamless reconciliation.
    • Ensure compliance with tax services in China and other jurisdictions.

    Yes, we provide ERP implementation and support as part of our accounting and reporting advisory. Our services include:

    • ERP system selection and setup, ensuring compatibility with corporate accounting software.
    • Customization and integration with existing treasury management tools.
    • Ongoing ERP support and training, helping businesses maximize system efficiency.

    Our Virtual CFO services help businesses manage financial operations without hiring a full-time CFO. We offer:

    • Remote CFO service for strategic financial oversight.
    • Interim CFO services for businesses undergoing transitions or expansions.
    • Treasury management to optimize cash flow and liquidity.
    • Financial planning and analysis, ensuring compliance with IFRS accounting and reporting services.
      These services provide cost-effective expertise, enabling businesses to make informed financial decisions.

    Yes, we provide payroll processing and compliance services as part of our corporate accounting services. Our solutions include:

    • Payroll calculation and processing for employees in China, India, Singapore, and ASEAN markets.
    • Tax withholding and compliance with local employment regulations.
    • Payroll reporting integration with bookkeeping reports and financial statements.

    Outsourcing accounting services in Asia allows businesses to:

    • Reduce costs by eliminating the need for in-house accountants.
    • Ensure compliance with evolving tax and financial regulations.
    • Improve accuracy through professional IFRS accounting and reporting services.
    • Enhance financial transparency, supporting business growth and investment decisions.

    Getting started is simple! Contact our corporate accountants to discuss your corporate accounting service’s needs. We offer:

    • A free initial consultation to assess your business requirements.
    • A tailored approach based on industry, size, and financial complexity.
    • Seamless onboarding with integration into existing systems.
